metadata.title: CVE-2015-4707 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IPython before 3.2 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectorsinvolving JSON error messages and the /api/notebooks path.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4707` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 2.4.1-1
ipython-notebook - 2.4.1-1
ipython-notebook-common - 2.4.1-1
ipython-qtconsole - 2.4.1-1
ipython3 - 2.4.1-1
ipython3-notebook - 2.4.1-1
ipython3-qtconsole - 2.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-1').
